title: Free-Kindergarten-Services
details: The Association operates and gives kindergarten services for children from poor familiesâ€™ age from 4 to 6 selected from the community by the concerned government authorities. These services are rendered in Addis Ababa, Akaki/Kality Sub City, in a specific place called Salo-gora and in Amhara National Regional State at Northern Showa Zone Debre Birhan Town.
two_detail: The two Kindergarten centers are providing the services for16 and 20 years at Addis Ababa and Debre Birhan respectively.  The children have received a free schooling that includes school material, uniform, breakfast and a meal (lunch) once a day during all the service years.
